vsParam:
Undertaking commissions, killing monsters, and
plotting maps... Uh, adventurers need to plot maps!?

Yes. My country is a newly established one,
maps of many places are not plotted yet.
Hey, Totori, what are you guys talking about?

Ah, [px] and Peppermint!
I'm introducing my job as an adventurer to them...

Surprisingly, they are all interested,
so I talked a bit more.

Oh, I see. After all, we don't have "adventurer" here
in Bressisle, everyone would be attracted to such a new
concept!

Not just new! The more I listen to her story,
the more I feel that Totori is really remarkable!

Exactly, she's still a child, and yet she embarked on
adventures and managed to surmount all kinds of
difficulties! I am ashamed of myself!
Uh? I, I am not a child!

Ho ho, you are so kawaii!
Feel free to look for us when you need help.

*Sob sob*, they treat me like a kid...
I already said I am not a child...

Ah! Totori, you are here!
I worried sick after you ran away all of a sudden!
Was it because everyone treats you as a child...
All that matters is you are alright.

Ah haha...
My reaction just now did like a child...

Sorry to make you worry about me...
I just couldn't stand the atmosphere just now...

But, I'll try to change everyone's
impression of me... Hmm

Right! If I can prove myself to be a solo adventurer,
you guys wouldn't treat me as a child anymore, right?

Why are you so concerned with being treated
like a child... But, what do you plan to do?

Ah, right,
There's actually something I am concerned with...

Bressisle has everything,
but not a detailed map, right?
Wouldn't it be inconvenient for people to travel alone?

Ah, you don't have to worry about that! The Chivalric
Order is protecting the main road all the time!

People would hire a guardian when they travel.
But yeah, a detailed map would be a great help...

Perhaps that's because we have comprehensive
organizations here, people normally don't feel like
needing a map.

I understand...
It's settled! I am going to plot a map!

A detailed and accurate map would bring lots of
conveniences to people who travel alone.

Oh, you just volunteered to undertake such a tedious
job... You are worthy of the title of adventurer!

But don't do this thing all by yourself,
just tell us if you need any help, okay?

I'll need some items for my large-scale exploration.
Can you help me make them?

Sure, a piece of cake!
Let's get started, [px]!

Thank you!
With so all in readiness, I can depart to plot the map!

Vulnerary, bombs, solid food... er. I got everything
I'll need. There should be nothing left out.

Your luggage is so neat and orderly.
If Captain sees that, he'd be full of praises for you!

Hehe. Being able to make preparations so perfectly,
You are already a solo adventurer.

With all these items you made for me,
I won't be afraid when I am out there alone!
Ha-ha. You are still childish, huh?
*Sob sob*, don't make fun of me...

Although your ambition is lofty...
If you feel lonely, just come back!

Ah... It seems that she's going to be
our younger sister for a while.

Ha-ha. What can we do about it?
Her sensible personality is also very kawaii!
